name: Apple Inc.
about: Apple designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, and accessories.

name: Tesla, Inc.
about: Tesla designs and manufactures electric vehicles and battery energy storage from home to grid-scale.

name: Microsoft Corp.
about: Microsoft is a global technology company that develops, licenses, and supports software, services, and devices.

name: NVIDIA
about: NVIDIA is the pioneer of GPU-accelerated computing, focusing on products for gaming, data centers, and AI.
